Detailed Description

(Deployment Application) stolen from Click's bitvector. A wrapper class that acts like a single bit.

Bits are returned by modifiable Bitvectors' operator[]. They act like bools, but Bit operations actually index into individual bits in some shared word.

Member Function Documentation

Bit& Bitvector::Bit::operator= ( const Bit &  x  )  [inline]

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.
